story_23_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
According to the map, the spot should be right
around here.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: It certainly seems like that would be the case...
story_23_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
You’re every bit as strong as I’ve heard, Elesa!
I’m looking forward to the real match!
story_23_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
So am I. Though getting challenged like that was
more than a little startling.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But was it really a good idea to show a
potential tournament opponent your strengths
and weaknesses?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
It’s fine, it’s fine! Battles are the most fun when
you just battle when you want without getting
caught up in stuff like that.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Plus...we’re both still hiding an ace up our
sleeve, aren’t we?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: That was a great battle, Leaf!
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Misty! Oh, and [Name:PlayerNickname ], too!
What’re you doing here?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Oh, I get it! You came for a battle with me,
too, huh?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: I’m afraid not. We came to find Elesa, actually.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: You... Are you Valerie, the designer?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Wha—? You’ve heard of me, Elesa?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Of course! We models hold the fashions you
create in the highest regard.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’m glad you found me. There’s actually something
I’d like to ask you.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Hehe. You sure have an interesting way of
thinking about things, Valerie.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
One day, I really hope you’ll wear one of the
dresses I make.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Heh. Looks like the two of them are getting along
just fine.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
By the way, Valerie, about you wanting to
become a Pokémon...
story_23_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Huh? Of course I was.
I absolutely want to be a Pokémon.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_3100_10:
And I actually know a way...
A way to become a Pokémon.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Yeah. I’m sure it’s exactly the kind of thing you’re
looking for, Valerie.
story_23_04000/2401_1001_3400_10: You mean it? Can I really, really be a Pokémon?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_3500_10: Yes, if you follow what I say. All right...
story_23_04000/2401_1001_3600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Have a battle with
Valerie right now!
story_23_04000/2401_0302_3900_10:
Is that the way to become
a Pokémon?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Valerie, this will be your first battle on Pasio,
right? That should do the trick!
story_23_04000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Huh? You actually understand what’s happening
here, Elesa? What does she mean? How will this
make someone a Pokémon?
story_23_04000/2401_1001_4500_10: C’mon. It’s time to battle with all your might!
story_23_04000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Hmm. I still don’t really understand, but I’m up for
it if you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_23_04000/2401_1001_4700_10:
The elusive Fairy types may appear frail as
a breeze and delicate as a bloom, but they
are strong.
